i sell clothing on facebook.
i like cosplay.

participant_2.background:
I don't care what my father thinks, I like what I like.
I was able to make a delicious pie for my family even though my credit cards were maxed out.
I collect interesting stories from my neighborhood.
I want to stay close to my mom and my grandchildren.
i love to larp.

content.text: Hey, how are you doing today?
I'm doing good, how about you?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking. I'm a single scientist who uses makeup to feel confident and powerful. Do you have any hobbies?
I like to cook, and I'm really into larp. I also collect interesting stories from my neighborhood. What kind of things do you like to do?
I like to cosplay, and I'm learning how to play the guitar. I also sell clothing on facebook. What's your favorite thing about larp?
I love the community aspect of it, and the fact that you can be anyone you want. I also love the creativity that goes into making your costume. What's your favorite thing about cosplay?
I love the way it lets me express myself, and I love the community too. I've made some really great friends through cosplay.
That's awesome! I'm glad you've had a positive experience with it.
Me too! What's your favorite thing about your neighborhood?
I love the sense of community, and I love the way everyone looks out for each other. It's a great place to raise a family.
That sounds like a great place to live. I'm glad you're happy there.
